sections.heading: Act, how construed.Nothing in the Municipal Density and Missing Middle Housing Act shall be construed to prohibit any city from:(1) Regulating the siting and design of middle housing provided for under section 19-5505, except that such regulation shall not prohibit or have the effect of physically p
sections.text: Act, how construed.Nothing in the Municipal Density and Missing Middle Housing Act shall be construed to prohibit any city from:(1) Regulating the siting and design of middle housing provided for under section 19-5505, except that such regulation shall not prohibit or have the effect of physically precluding the development of middle housing in any residential area; or(2) Allowing single-family dwellings in areas zoned to allow for single-family dwellings.SourceLaws 2020, LB866, ยง 6.
